prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a creature with an armored body and a mask-like face.
I want a unique hybrid Pokemon that combines features of a dragon and a wolf.
Generate an unusual Pokemon that appears to be both mechanical and organic in design.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of stealth, with muted colors and sharp features.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a blend of animalistic and robotic characteristics, perfect for espionage.
Design a creature that has a combination of elegant and fierce traits, with a striking color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in diverse environments, blending into both urban and natural settings.
